value.title: Disabling auto date-time in Power BI
value.excerpt: This video shows how to disable the date table automatically created by Power BI. Article and download: https://sql.bi/137706

value.title: Displaying filter context in Power BI Tooltips
value.excerpt: Display the filter context applied to a calculation using a special DAX measure in Power BI Tooltips. Article and download: https://sql.bi/79070?aff=yt

value.title: Distinguishing HASONEVALUE from ISINSCOPE
value.excerpt: This video describes the differences between HASONEVALUE and ISINSCOPE, which are two useful DAX functions to control the filters and the grouping that are active in a report. Article and download: https://sql.bi/662962?aff=yt

value.title: Filtering a measure in DAX Studio
value.excerpt: DAX Studio can evaluate one or more measures in a query. Marco Russo shows how to apply filters to a measure executed in DAX Studio. Continuous learning to improve your productivity!  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/ DAX Studio: https://daxstudio.org/

value.title: Syncing slicers in Power BI
value.excerpt: Use a measure to filter slicer items instead of relying on bidirectional filters: you avoid calculation issues and improve the performance of your reports! Article and sample download: https://sql.bi/186105?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive guide to DAX:

value.title: Govern data across an enterprise
value.excerpt: Govern data across an enterprise

topItems.title: Discover trusted data using Microsoft Purview
Manage Power BI assets by using Microsoft Purview
topItems.excerpt: Improve data governance and asset discovery using Power BI and Microsoft Purview integration.

value.title: Implement advanced data visualization techniques by using Power BI
value.excerpt: Implement advanced data visualization techniques by using Power BI

topItems.title: Understand advanced data visualization concepts
topItems.excerpt: Create cohesive, inclusive, and efficient Power BI reports to effectively communicate results.

topItems.title: Monitor data in real-time with Power BI
topItems.excerpt: Describe real-time analytics in Power BI using automatic page refresh, real-time dashboards, and auto-refresh in paginated reports.

topItems.title: CreateÂ paginated reportsÂ Â
topItems.excerpt: Paginated reports allow report developers to create Power BI artifacts that have tightly controlled rendering requirements. Paginated reports are ideal for creating sales invoices, receipts, purchase orders, and tabular data. This module will teach you how to create reports, add parameters, and work with tables and charts in paginated reports.

value.title: Automate data cleaning with Power Query
value.excerpt: This module introduces Power Query in Microsoft Excel, a powerful data connection, cleaning, and shaping technology that is a core part of the Microsoft modern analytics suite of business intelligence tools.

value.title: Enforce Power BI model security
value.excerpt: Enforce model security in Power BI using row-level security and object-level security.

value.title: Get started with data science in Microsoft Fabric
value.excerpt: Get started with data science in Microsoft Fabric by learning how to train a model in a notebook, and track your metrics with MLflow and experiments.

value.title: Ingest Data with Dataflows Gen2 in Microsoft Fabric
value.excerpt: Data ingestion is crucial in analytics. Microsoft Fabric's Data Factory offers Dataflows (Gen2) for visually creating multi-step data ingestion and transformation using Power Query Online.

value.title: Manage Power BI assets by using Microsoft Purview
value.excerpt: Improve data governance and asset discovery using Power BI and Microsoft Purview integration.

value.title: Introduction to foundations in data modeling
value.excerpt: This module introduces the key concepts that are related to developing a well-organized data model.

value.title: Transition from Excel to Power BI
value.excerpt: Microsoft's Power BI combines the Power Query's extraction, transformation, and loading capabilities with DAX and a relational data model in a new application with new features.

value.title: Structure analytical report designs in Power BI
value.excerpt: Designing an analytical report involves understanding the requirements and its audience. However, designing a compelling analytical report requires understanding the automatic and unconscious processes that occur when report consumers comprehend what they see. When you have the knowledge of how to structure and apply report design principles, you can raise the level of your report designs to produce relevant, intuitive, and visually pleasing experiences for your report consumers.

value.title: Understand advanced data visualization concepts
value.excerpt: Create cohesive, inclusive, and efficient Power BI reports to effectively communicate results.

value.title: Append and Merge Tables in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to quickly merge and append tables using the query editior in Power BI. Build models with multiple data sources. Contact me on LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/in/gaelimholland

value.title: DAX Table Functions: ALL, FILTER, & VALUES
value.excerpt: Learn how to incorporate DAX Table functions in Power BI with real world scenarios. Also learn how to quickly add these functions in to dynamic calculations in DAX.

value.title: Price Prediction with Python and Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to create a machine learning price prediction using Python machine learning linear regression model and a dataset of 54,000 diamonds. This will be ported over to Power BI for a deeper level of interaction.  You can find the files and dataset here: https://github.com/Gaelim/Diamond-Price-Prediction

value.title: Analyze and visualize your Outlook/Exchange calendar in Power BI
value.excerpt: Where is your time going? Do you feel that you are having too many meetings and not enough time to get your work done? Do you want to check if your gut-feeling is correct?  In todays video I will show you how to import your calendar from Outlook into Power BI and show you one way to visualize it.  Link
